-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A GHC plugin for improving disambiguation of effects.
--   
--   Instruct GHC to do a better job with disambiguation of effects.
--   
--   See the README for more information.
@package effectful-plugin
@version 1.1.0.2

module Effectful.Plugin
plugin :: Plugin
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Effectful.Plugin.OrdType
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Effectful.Plugin.OrdType
instance GHC.Show.Show Effectful.Plugin.EffWanted
instance GHC.Show.Show Effectful.Plugin.EffGiven
